site_name: CANADA WATER MASTERPLAN - LAND BOUNDED BY LOWER ROAD (WEST), REDRIFF ROAD (SOUTH), QUEBEC WAY (EAST), SURREY QUAYS ROAD AND CANADA WATER DOCK (NORTH), AND SITE AT ROBERTS CLOSE, LONDON SE16
description: The application has been amended and the changes can be summarised as below:  Submission of Housing Statement Addendum – detailing increased minimum number of new homes and increased number of affordable housing units; Submission of Transport Assessment Addendum – detailing updated highways modelling; Submission of Environmental Statement Addendum - transport, noise and vibration, air quality chapters to assess the updated highways modelling and socio-economics chapter to assess the updated housing mix; Minor changes to Design Guidelines; Minor changes to Plans for Interim Petrol Filling Station.  A more detailed overview of the changes is provided in the applicant's cover letter, which is available online at the link below.
